jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Responsibilities include implementation of various project frontends, widget toolkits, and developing interfaces for administration of client websites and internal micro-services. The developer will work closely with designers to help produce elegant user experiences. Most projects are done in Vue3 or React, using modern javascript (ES Modules), Typescript and PostCSS/SCSS.
responsibilities: Use Javascript and Typescript with Vue3 to build complex web applications
Contribute unit and integration tests to maintain a high quality code base
Prototype new projects and work on internal tools
requirements: Proficient with modern software development tools (bundlers, linting, CI/CD, etc)
2+ years with at least one modern web application framework (React or Vue preferred)
Strong understanding of application architecture, scalability, and web security

jobs.title: Tech Lead
jobs.description:
Your primary duties include breaking down product requirements into detailed development plans, and managing the engineering team a day to day basis, while filling in gaps in development as needed. You'll also assist with hiring engineering talent, including filtering candidates and interviewing. The Tech Lead is responsible for final code review, developer resource allocation, and interfacing with other project teams.

It's useful, but not required, to have previous experience with the Ethereum ecosystem and modern web development frameworks such as VueJS and NestJS.
responsibilities: Day to day engineering team management
Convert product requirements and designs to engineering tasks
Identify and proposing improvements to software development, testing, and deployment processes
Short and long term planning to meet project deadlines
Maintain collaboration, urgency, and enthusiasm among employees
requirements: Degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent experience
Fluent in Mandarin, proficient in English
3 years of experience in Software Engineering, Product Management, or Technical Program Management
Experience building deliverables across the different phases of the Software Development Lifecycle
Experience building APIs and managing technical integrations through APIs

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Responsibilities include backend development for various projects, improving testing and deployment strategies, and directing application architecture of new services. Must have experience with authentication, API development, and databases. The role involves close collaboration with front-end, DevOps, and blockchain developers.
responsibilities: Contributing to multiple internal and client projects
Create robust REST APIs for consumption by mobile and web clients
Maintenance and testing to ensure a high quality code base
requirements: 2+ years working on complex web backends using Javascript or Typescript
Proficient with modern software development tools
2+ years writing NodeJS or Python backend applications
Strong understanding of application architecture, scalability, and web security

jobs.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs.description:
Duties include developing and testing smart contracts, managing deployment strategies, and assisting with backend integrations. Additionally, the blockchain developer will guide blockchain related technology decisions, prototype new ideas, and work closely with front and back-end developers to complete internal and client projects.

To apply for this position, please reach out via contact@samatech.tw, CakeResume, or our Contact page.
responsibilities: Research, design, develop, and test smart contracts, and other blockchain related technologies
Assist in building applications that interact with the blockchain
Keep up with the latest developments in the blockchain community
Evaluate applications of new tools and technologies as they evolve
requirements: 1+ years developing smart contracts (or able to show significant smart contract related work)
2+ years experience in another area of software development
Proficient with modern software development tools
Strong understanding of application architecture, scalability, and security
